== Kochi (M Corp. + OG) (Part) (803288) ==

Kochi (M Corp. + OG) (Part) is a town in the [[Kochi]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 45.47 sq. km. and harbouring 65469 households with total population of 274350 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 219 km. Male population is 136262 and female population is 138088. Scheduled Caste population is 6903 and Scheduled Tribes population is 788. Census Location Code of the town is 803288<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class I (population_total > 1,00,000).
The civic status of the town is ''.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 0 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 0 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam at a distance of 0 km.
